changelogs.changelog: Added ability to use flags in AutoMod regex triggers

Added brand new automod system! AutoMod includes punishment logging, powerful rule support with regex, and can automatically mute users and delete messages when they hit an automod trigger. It's highly customizable
Changed `m: color` font size to align with linux font differences
Fixed bug in purge command permission checking caused by previous update
`m: purge` now uses channel permissions instead of server-wide permissions
Added `m: color` command to get information about a color
Changelog will now show all new changes even if modbot isn't updated on every release
